verse:
गोपालांगणकर्दमे विहरसे विप्राध्वरे लज्जसे 
 ब्रूषे गोसुतहुंकृतै: स्तुतिपदैर्मौनं विधत्से सताम् ।
 दास्यं गोकुलकामिनीषु कुरुषे स्वाम्यं न दत्तात्मसु 
 जाने कृष्ण त्वदीयपादयुगलं भक्तिकलभ्यं परम् ॥

terms.गोपालांगणकर्दमे: in the pleasure gardens of Gopala
terms.दत्तात्मसु: to those who have given themselves

meaning: O Krishna! In the garden of Gopala, you play and feel shy, O best among the brahmins. You express yourself through words of praise and silence, by the pure devotees. You perform servitude to the damsels of Gokula, but not to those who don't surrender. O Krishna! I know that your pair of feet, obtained through devotion, is the supreme goal.
